response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, reflecting years of expertise and innovation. Given its significance, we are offering it to you at a special price tailored to your needs. We believe that at $800,000, this represents a fair and advantageous deal for both parties. Should you decide to proceed, we promise a seamless transaction and unparalleled customer service. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 800000}
